info.name: Justification Factory Stack
info.description: Requests samples using the stack of Justification Factory (bus & engine webservices).

request.description: Send a support to the bus to build new Justification Diagram steps.
Add a Justification System to the Justification Factory.
Fetch a Justification System from the Justification Diagram.
Delete a Justification System of the Justification Factory.

item.name: Retrieve the names of known Justification Systems

request.description: Fetch only the names of the known Justification Systems instances in the Justification Factory.
